short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Debug your layouts with one line of CSS and a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension injects simple-debug.css's one line of CSS into the current page, adding outlines and a sense of depth to the page's elements, to make debugging the page layout easier.
